none.description: Use when there should be no space between content and element's edges.

sm.description: Compact padding, used in Rich Text Editor, or X-Small Buttons

md.description: Default padding used for components used around Small Button content.

lg.description: Large padding, used in Medium Buttons with Icons

xl.description: Padding used around Card and Medium Button content

2xl.description: Padding used around Modal and Large Button content

none.description: Use when there is no space between elements

xs.description: Compact spacing from icon to text, labels to inputs, between tab items.

sm.description: Horizontal space between pills, tighter space between buttons, inline icon to text, segmented controls.

md.description: Use the default inline spacing when other gap tokens may not fit.

lg.description: Use this for tighter spacing between cards. Cards are self contained blocks of content.

xl.description: Use this for the default spacing between cards, as well as the gutter width used in the large 12-column grid.

2xl.description: Use this for the space between content sections
